title: Titan Quest
description:
You Need A Virtual Drive Manager To Run This Game 

If You Need One Download The One I Uploaded For You 
Daemon Manager

To install mount the disk into daemon manager

-open daemon manager 
find where the torrent was downloaded to
mount one of the two files located within the folder DvD

open my computer 
you will see the virtual drive click on it this will bring up the game menu click to install

you will have to input the CD key for the game which can be found in the notepad document titled serial 



once you have this game installed you can also download the expansion to it titan quest immortal throne which i also have posted you will have to do the same process to install that one as well and the cd key is also located in a text document within the torrent it self.

you have to have this one installed in order to install the expansion s
